term.title: surface region

item.text: The tridimensional region, extending from the free surface of a condensed phase towards the interior, where the properties differ from the bulk. The term surface may also be used in this sense.

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 1251. 'Interphases in systems of conducting phases (Provisional)' on page 1253 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355081251)
